frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description: Fires a long-range precision energy bolt. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
Speeds up charge.
  •  Faster charge time
  •  Decreases impact damage
perks.name: Accelerated Coils

perks.description:
Strong battery life.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Enhanced Battery

perks.description:
Large heavy battery.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Ionized Battery

perks.description:
Slower-building charge for higher damage.
  •  Increases impact damage
  •  Slower charge time
perks.name: Liquid Coils

perks.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Particle Repeater

perks.description:
Distance optimizations.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Projection Fuse

perks.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Aiming this weapon for a short period reduces flinch.
perks.name: No Distractions

perks.description: Grants increased reload speed when close to full magazine.
perks.name: Compulsive Reloader

perks.description: Substantially increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Aiming this weapon for a very short period of time reduces flinch.
perks.name: No Distractions

perks.description: Grants greatly increased reload speed when close to full magazine.
perks.name: Compulsive Reloader

perks.description: Final blows with weapons or abilities while this weapon is stowed increase its handling, stability, and reload speed for a short duration.
perks.name: Sleight of Hand

perks.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.
perks.name: Dragonfly

perks.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine.
perks.name: Fourth Time's the Charm

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up

perks.description: Final blows with weapons or abilities while this weapon is stowed increase its handling, stability, and reload speed for an improved duration.
perks.name: Sleight of Hand

perks.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine. Increases time between precision shots.
perks.name: Fourth Time's the Charm

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed for an improved duration.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up

perks.description: This weapon adapts its damage output and effectiveness against energy shields that don't match the weapon's damage type.
perks.name: Adaptive Munitions

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Rounds at the end of the magazine deal more damage.
perks.name: High-Impact Reserves

perks.description: This weapon adapts its damage output to be more effective against energy shields that don't match its damage type. Improves damage increase.
perks.name: Adaptive Munitions

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield for an improved duration.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Aiming this weapon for a short period without firing grants bonus range and precision damage that resets after firing or exiting zoom.
perks.name: Box Breathing

perks.description: Reloading this weapon randomly overfills it from reserves.
perks.name: Clown Cartridge

perks.description: Deal damage with all equipped weapons within a short time to give this weapon a damage boost.
perks.name: Bait and Switch

perks.description: Dealing half of the magazine as precision damage grants this weapon bonus damage. The shot count is reset whenever the weapon is reloaded or stowed.
perks.name: Focused Fury

perks.description: Aiming this weapon for an improved short period without firing grants bonus range and precision damage that resets after firing or exiting zoom.
perks.name: Box Breathing

perks.description: Reloading this weapon randomly overfills it from reserves to an improved degree.
perks.name: Clown Cartridge

perks.description: Deal damage with all equipped weapons within a short time to give this weapon a damage boost for an improved duration.
perks.name: Bait and Switch

perks.description: Dealing half of the magazine as precision damage grants this weapon bonus damage for an improved duration. The shot count is reset whenever the weapon is reloaded or stowed.
perks.name: Focused Fury

perks.description: Gain health based on the number of hits before reloading.
perks.name: Souldrinker
